entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
